com.labyrinth.ui

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinth.ui.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a text based user interface for use as a front-end for the Labyrinth game. This user interface works with a valid conforming GameMode object (e.g. TreasureChase).
    Version:
    0.1.19042013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GameView(GameMode game)
      Construct a new user interface to interface with a valid game mode.
